body: @umlink I am appreicated if you can fix it, thanks.
Check out the dump file, which is at `/data/data/com.mobileshare.app/app_crash/crash_dump.log` as shown in the log you provdied.
This file will be deleted soon.
0.28和0.26的 JS 引擎不一样，不同的JS引擎可能对trim的处理有区别。
There are some different behaviour bentween iOS and Andorid, you can improve Weex Document to help us.

The [code](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/master/android/sdk/src/main/java/org/apache/weex/utils/WXSoInstallMgrSdk.java#L326) in master branch has changed, `WXEnvironment.sUseRunTimeApi` will be ture if we use libjsc.so

Could you please check that?

No response in a month, I will close it.

Feel free to reopen.

@FightingForDevelop You remove [init](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/7548ba6214ddfe16455cf03c577941f1dfb1ecdc/android/sdk/src/main/java/org/apache/weex/WXSDKEngine.java#L219), and everything went well?

That's very unlikely.
Please proveide a [runnable demo](http://dotwe.org/vue), thanks

> **you can edit your build.gradle in app**
> such as ndk：
> 
> ```
> ndk {
>             abiFilters "x86"
>             abiFilters "arm64-v8a"
>             abiFilters "armeabi-v7a"
>  }
> ```
I have added it,it isn't the resone.
ndk {
            abiFilters "armeabi-v7a", "x86"
        }
build a jsfm make to Promise doesn't use native.and it work.

> @FightingForDevelop You remove [init](https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/blob/7548ba6214ddfe16455cf03c577941f1dfb1ecdc/android/sdk/src/main/java/org/apache/weex/WXSDKEngine.java#L219), and everything went well?
> 
> That's very unlikely.

No,no,I just simulate the error to locate the problem.I find that White Screen onRenderError -1001 because it hasn't finished initialize.So I initialize it again  the page onException by code -1001. How can I know when it's initialized and then load the page?

I meet the same problem with weex_sdk 0.26.0 && weex_sdk 0.28.0.
weex_sdk 0.20.3.0-beta is work fine。
有临时解决办法吗，急用
关注

对于 View 层次改变问题，也许可以通过编写一个容器组件来根据配置生成多个叠放的 Alert，需要修改层次的时候更新这个容器组件的配置即可。

对于 WebSocket 的共享问题，也许可以通过跨页面通信的方式来解决，最先启动的 Weex 页面来负责建立连接，然后将消息分发到其他页面....

不支持 z-index 这个问题感觉是有点痛苦，特别是要做一些动画切换效果的时候...
现在有一个横向长列表的需求，用scroller组件会出现内存溢出，求解决，或者一个临时解决方案

> 用普通List，RecycleList的bug后续修复。
> http://dotwe.org/vue/443eaf9819c6bf59b22766352223d140

求解决，RecycleList相比list在长列表上优化了不少，但是这个bug导致不能用

jsc的选择权移交给了开发者。现在对于jsc的好坏/高低都依赖开发者自己的了解/选择。不同的jsc，主要由对应的jsc社区维护
https://weex.apache.org/zh/download/major_change.html#_0-28

> https://weex.apache.org/zh/download/major_change.html#_0-28

链接打开正常。请确认本地网络

> 链接打开正常。请确认本地网络

可以了，下午查看的时候返回 503

Unable to play video with url rtsp,show the details as bellow:
<video class="video" src="rtsp://wowzaec2demo.streamlock.net/vod/mp4:BigBuckBunny_115k.mov" controls="nocontrols" play-status='pause' auto-play='true' v-if="showMusic"></video>

how can I solve this problem？
This issue is very urgent,pls help.thks.
官方应该维护更新呀，这样weex才能推广的更好。
有人也遇到类似的问题，不知是否已经解决。https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/2819
https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WEEX/RoadMap

期待升级，官方还继续维护吗？
Hope that the official can provide JSC with higher performance
希望官方能继续维护JSC 引擎
现在jsc的性能不太行，希望能升级一下
我也遇到了这个问题，希望官方抓紧跟进。

It works all right。只是print log方式有点“变化”
安卓0.28 Js log 是在独立进程打印的。
IDE 搜索log时，需要注意filter规则，不能选 show only selected application。要选择 NO filters
这样就能找到Js log

it works fine. “console.debug” works fine.
安卓0.28 js log是打印在独立进程的。
IDE搜索log时，filter设置为 No Filters。即可看到log
可以尝试换个好点的梯子，或者把地址中的内容放到本地去。
请清楚、准确的描述你的问题。

you may have set targetSdkVersion = 29,  try  down to 28, It works for me, as issues 
https://github.com/apache/incubator-weex/issues/2706
March is coming and this will be a real **bug** by then.
try down to targetSdkVersion = 28, or targetSdkVersion = 26

在v0.28，开发者可以自己选择使用哪个版本的JSC [1]，并且提供的样例[4]中使用版本是241213.1.0对应webkitGTK 版本 2.22.6 [3]。webkitGTK v 2.22.6 release 时间[2]是 2019-2-8 下午02:54:05 。 
当前，241213.1.0 是 jsc-android的latest版本[5]。当然你可以尝试其他的版本。

[1] https://weex.apache.org/zh/download/major_change.html#javascript-interpreter  
[2] https://trac.webkit.org/changeset/241213/webkit
[3] https://github.com/react-native-community/jsc-android-buildscripts/pull/86/files#diff-b9cfc7f2cdf78a7f4b91a753d10865a2
[4] https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/incubator-weex/release/0.28/android/sdk/buildSrc/download_jsc.gradle
[5] https://www.npmjs.com/package/jsc-android
Duplicate of #3139
How did you determine that the JSC version was 2016 ？
很好奇，你们是怎么判定JSC的性能低的呀

你提供了项目只有jscore，你倒是再提供一个v8的样例啊！！！

1. Apache Weex 现在和淘宝无关(尽管源自淘宝)
2. 我不是淘宝的员工，现在没有任何人付钱(包括你在内)给我做 Apache Weex。
3. Talk is cheap, show your code.

This is the [offical comment](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/fdf5f7d44e739d0814b41e12721b161b0946fc544f0a1707fec7f5c3%40%3Cdev.weex.apache.org%3E) of such issue.

In a word, **This update has nothing to do with Weex Apps, but Apps that people try to load from a remote server. Try not to load code from a server if your App(s) falls into the case mentioned above”**
@chs97 Not quite sure what you mean.
@chs97 Anything need I do?
Again, `video` in Weex is for demo purpose, you should not use it in your production environment.
I never try it in App bundle model.

It works well now, there is some network problem between the server of TravisCI and Maven repo.

怎么在Android studio里添加引擎，我按照[weex官方文档](https://weex.apache.org/zh/download/major_change.html#_0-28)在项目里的Gradle配置了`apply from: 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/incubator-weex/release/0.28/android/sdk/buildSrc/download_jsc.gradle'`
